Tunebooks

Some of you would like to have printable copies of the music. We’ve taken all tunes we’ve collected and produced some different options:

  • current.pdf - PDF containing the Wellington Slow Session tunes
  • archive.pdf - PDF containing all the tunes on the site sorted by ‘Jigs’, ‘Reels’, ‘Polkas’ etv
  • archive-alpha.pdf - PDF containing all the tunes on the site sorted alphabetically
  • 2bar.pdf - PDF with just the first two bars of the tunes
    • Some people like this as a handy reference when they can’t think how a tune starts!

You can also get copies of the ABC files that were used to generate these PDFs:

  • current.abc
  • archive.abc
  • archive-alpha.abc
  • 2bar.abc

You can also search our archive for single tunes by name or particular types of tunes e.g. Reels, Slip Jigs, Polkas and print out copies of the sheet music. If you try this Please be patient! It takes a while to generate all the dots!

  • Searchable Tunebook

For more information, follow us on Facebook, get in touch via email (admin@wellingtonsession.org), or just come along.

This website is built using Jekyll, and the source code is available at Github. You are welcome to grab the source and customise it for your own purposes. If they are any mistakes in the tunes, or other problems, send us an email at (admin@wellingtonsession.org).
